description: Stack-based buffer overflow in RunTime.exe in Sielco Sistemi Winlog Pro SCADA before 2.07.17 and Winlog Lite SCADA before 2.07.17 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted port-46824 TCP packet that triggers an incorrect file-open attempt by the _TCPIPS_BinOpenFileFP function, a different vulnerability than CVE-2012-3815.  NOTE: some of these details are obtained from third party information.
